name: StructuralGraphicsConnect
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: structural graphics connect
des:
The Structural Graphic Connect Skill is designed to show a prospective pharmaceutical client how a custom Alexa Skill designed to compliment a Structural Graphics interactive brochure would work. 

After a welcome message the skill provides the health care professional with suggested prompts such as “medical condition” “symptoms” or “clinical studies”. The HCP can respond with these prompts after which the skill will provide relevant information. 

In addition the health care professional can always ask for “more information” to which the skill could provide a relevant phone number to call or possibly an app to download.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
